summary.para: Creates an instance of the sink writer or source reader, given an IUnknown pointer.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID of the object to create.

description.para: Create the sink writer. The ppvObject parameter receives an interface pointer.
Create the source reader. The ppvObject parameter receives an interface pointer.

param.name: punkObject
param.para: A pointer to the IUnknown interface of an object that is used to initialize the source reader or sink writer. The method queries this pointer for one of the following interfaces.

description.para: If clsid is CLSID_MFSinkWriter, the sink writer writes data to this byte stream.
If clsid is CLSID_MFSourceReader, this byte stream provides the source data for the source reader.
Pointer to a media sink. Applies only when clsid is CLSID_MFSinkWriter.
Pointer to a media source. Applies only when clsid is CLSID_MFSourceReader.

param.name: pAttributes
param.para: A pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the sink writer or source reader. For more information, see the following topics:

param.name: riid
param.para: The IID of the requested interface.

param.name: ppvObject
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.

summary.para: Creates an instance of the sink writer or source reader, given a URL.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID of the object to create.

description.para: Create the sink writer. The ppvObject parameter receives an interface pointer.
Create the source reader. The ppvObject parameter receives an interface pointer.

param.name: pwszURL
param.para: A null-terminated string that contains a URL. If clsid is CLSID_MFSinkWriter, the URL specifies the name of the output file. The sink writer creates a new file with this name. If clsid is CLSID_MFSourceReader, the URL specifies the input file for the source reader.

param.name: pAttributes
param.para: A pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the sink writer or source reader. For more information, see the following topics:

param.name: riid
param.para: The IID of the requested interface.

param.name: ppvObject
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.

summary.para: Creates an instance of either the sink writer or the source reader.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call the CoCreateInstance function. The CLSID is CLSID_MFReadWriteClassFactory. Call the function before using the interface.
As an alternative to using this interface, you can call any of the following functions:
Internally, these functions use the IMFReadWriteClassFactory interface.
This interface is available on Windows Vista if Platform Update Supplement for Windows Vista is installed.
